verses.name: 1 Corinthians 10:6
verses.text: Now these things were our examples, to the intent we should not lust after evil things, as they also lusted.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 10:7
verses.text: Neither be ye idolaters, as were some of them; as it is written, The people sat down to eat and drink, and rose up to play.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 10:8
verses.text: Neither let us commit fornication, as some of them committed, and fell in one day three and twenty thousand.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 10:9
verses.text: Neither let us tempt Christ, as some of them also tempted, and were destroyed of serpents.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 10:10
verses.text: Neither murmur ye, as some of them also murmured, and were destroyed of the destroyer.
